27 struct TextureNode
28 {
29  TextureNode() {}
30  TextureNode(const Vector<int, 2>& origin, const Vector<int, 2>& size) :
31  m_origin(origin),
32  m_size(size) {
33  m_empty = true;
34  }
35 
36  Vector<int, 2> m_origin; // Top left of the rectangle this node represents
37 
39  Vector<int, 2> m_size;
40  bool m_empty; // true if this node is a leaf and is filled
41 
42  std::unique_ptr<TextureNode> m_left; // Left (or top) subdivision
43  std::unique_ptr<TextureNode> m_right; // Right (or bottom) subdivision
44 };
